metadata.title: CVE-2020-21596 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: libde265 v1.0.4 contains a global buffer overflow in the decode_CABAC_bitfunction, which can be exploited via a crafted a file.

criterions.comment: libde265: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
